import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Sizebar() { // State để điều khiển các menu collapse const [isSettingsCollapseOpen, setIsSettingsCollapseOpen] = useState(false); const [isServiceCollapseOpen, setIsServiceCollapseOpen] = useState(false); // Hàm để bật/tắt menu collapse const toggleSettingsCollapse = () => { setIsSettingsCollapseOpen(!isSettingsCollapseOpen); }; const toggleServiceCollapse = () => { setIsServiceCollapseOpen(!isServiceCollapseOpen); }; return (
